name: Far Shot
text: You are more accurate at longer ranges.
benefit: You only suffer a –1 penalty per full range increment between you and your target when using a ranged weapon.
normal: You suffer a –2 penalty per full range increment between you and your target.
staminaText: When making a single ranged attack as a standard action, you can spend 5 stamina points to ignore all range penalties on that attack.
mythicText: You make long-ranged attacks with remarkable accuracy.
mythicBenefit: As a swift action, you can expend one use of mythic power to ignore all range increment penalties for your ranged attacks until the end of your turn.
text_zh: 你长距离射击时比常人更准。
benefit_zh: 当你使用远程武器时，距离每增加一个射程增量你仅受到-1减值。
normal_zh: 你与目标之间距离每增加一个射程增量则受-2减值。
mythicText_zh: 你的远程射击精准度十分卓越。
mythicBenefit_zh: 以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，直至你的回合结束为止，你的远程攻击会忽略所有射程增量减值。
staminaText_zh: 当你以一个标准动作使用一次远端攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这次攻击无视掉所有的距离减值。
